column3:
Go to the application search page in the admin area

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//admin/applications

column4: At the bottom of the list of facets is a "Reporting Tools" section
An export section expands which includes a section to "download the current facets"

column3: Open the pull-down menu of facets to download

column4: At the top there is an "All" option
Listed beneath the "All" option are all the facets that appear on the search page

column3: Select an individual facet (e.g. "Date Applied Histogram") and click "Download"

column4: Your are offered a download box for a csv
The filename reflects the facet you selected

column3: Save the CSV to your computer
Open the CSV in a spreadsheet program

column4: The CSV contains meta information on the date of the export and the search URL used
The CSV contains the data that was displayed in the facet on the search page

column3: Go back to the application search page in the admin area, and go to the facet export section
Select "All" from the pull-down list of facets and click "Download"

column4: Your are offered a download box for a csv
The filename reflects that all facets have been selected

column3: Save the CSV to your computer
Open the CSV in a spreadsheet program

column4: The CSV contains meta information on the date of the export and the search URL used
The CSV contains the data that was displayed in all the facets on the search page
